A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is film that shatters expectations\, particularly expectations on who we think these beloved characters are. Some people may not like that\, but I enjoyed seeing a depth given to these characters that I couldn't even imagine existed\, and as a result I love the characters even more. The beauty of this film is that it makes you feel something new\, something unexpected\, the fact that you leave the theater with such a strong feeling is a testament to all who worked to bring this film to life.
